Applied Science.1: Demonstrate knowledge of agricultural commodity production.
Applied Science.2: Manage a farm or ranch enterprise or a career in agribusiness.
Applied Science.3: Locate and evaluate information to aid in decision-making.
Applied Science.4: Understand global challenges and issues related to food systems and agriculture.
Applied Science.5: Demonstrate effective written and oral communications skills.
Applied Science.6: Demonstrate critical thinking and decision making skills.
Applied Science.7: Have sufficient core competencies for effective lifetime learning.
